findings.title: (TwoMatchToken) whitelistByShare() function naming inconsistency
findings.description: The whitelistByShare() function is incorrectly named as whilelistByShare(). This could lead to confusion and potential security issues.

findings.title: _transfer() function adds TRANSACTION_TREASURY_SHARE
findings.description: The _transfer() function incorrectly adds TRANSACTION_TREASURY_SHARE to the transaction amount.

findings.title: Uninitialized Variable
findings.description: The userContributionRates variable is never initialized, which may lead to unexpected behavior or errors.

findings.title: Only presale address can call schedule() function
findings.description: The schedule() function has restricted access and can only be called by the presale address.

findings.title: Owner can change the tax and liquidity fee
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the tax and liquidity fee.

findings.title: Owner can prolong duration
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to prolong the duration of a particular process or event.

findings.title: Owner can start distribution
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to start distribution.

findings.title: Owner can claim
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to claim in the distribution process.
